# SampleConfs - Game System

Config files for core game systems, settings, and technical configurations.

## Input & Controls
- **DefaultHandle.json** - Default control handlers
- **DefaultKeys.json** - Default key bindings
- **GameHandleCode.json** - Handle code mappings
- **GameKeyCode.json** - Key code definitions

## Game Difficulty
- **GameDifficultyCrazy.json** - Crazy difficulty mode
- **GameDifficultyValue.json** - Difficulty values
- **GameUnitDifficulty.json** - Unit difficulty scaling

## Game Items & Rewards
- **GameItemCost.json** - Item costs
- **GameItemReward.json** - General rewards
- **GameItemRewardAbilitySuit.json** - Ability suit rewards
- **GameItemRewardArtifact.json** - Artifact rewards

## Game Parameters
- **GameParameter.json** - Core game parameters

## UI & Visual Settings
- **GameLoadScenesBG.json** - Loading screen backgrounds
- **GameLoadScenesTip.json** - Loading screen tips
- **GameSettingCursor.json** - Cursor settings

## Localization
- **LocalText.json** - Localized text strings
- **LogLocalVocal.json** - Vocal logging

## Audio System
- **SoundGroups.json** - Sound groupings
- **SoundLowPass.json** - Low-pass filter settings
- **SoundsEffectPitch.json** - Sound effect pitch

## Units & Actions
- **UnitActionTrigger.json** - Unit action triggers

## Weather System
- **WeatherChangAddRate.json** - Weather change rates
- **WeatherEffect.json** - Weather effects
- **WeatherLayout.json** - Weather patterns

---

**Total:** 30+ files
